name: Witcher Magic Ball Pop
description:
Witcher Magic Ball Pop is an addictive bubble shooter game with many exciting and challenging Levels! Join millions now in the best free bubble popper game ever!
FEATURES AND TIPS:
- Burst all bubbles to get target
- Brilliant and bright bubble graphics
- Completely FEE to play, challenging to master!
- Pop 3 or more same with minimum shoots to win 3-stars
- Magical bubbles : Rainbow bubble, Fire bubble, Aiming line, shield
